content: in 9 sts * 8 times repeat from in next st double_crochet in next st + dc3tog* 8 times * to + single_crochet in 4 sts join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet repeat from * to + join with slip_stitch in 1st 198 single_crochet dc3tog fasten_off 252 double_crochet & 9 dc3tog page 5 of 11 this pattern is only available for download from ravelry com ©frank orandle tides of change color 1 color 1 round 26 join in 1st double_crochet to the right of any round 31 join in any st chain 1 single_crochet increase in same dc3tog chain 2 decrease counts as 1st dc3tog st *single_crochet in 8 sts single_crochet increase in next st* 30 times single_crochet * double_crochet in 3 sts double_crochet increase in next st 3 times double_crochet in 2 in 8 sts join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 310 single_crochet sts double_crochet increase in next st double_crochet in 3 sts 3 times + dc3tog* 8 times repeat from * to + join round 32 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in 13 sts *chain with slip_stitch in top of 1st dc3tog fasten_off 6 skip 4 sts single_crochet in 27 sts* 9 times chain 6 skip 4 sts 288 double_crochet & 9 dc3tog single_crochet in 13 sts join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 270 single_crochet & 10 chain 6 color 2 round 27 join in 1st double_crochet to the right of any round 33 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in 11 sts skip 2 dc3tog chain 2 decrease counts as 1st dc3tog *double_crochet sts *14 double_crochet in chain 6 skip 2 sts single_crochet in 23 sts skip 2 in next st ehdc in next st half_double_crochet in 26 sts ehdc single_crochet* 9 times 14 double_crochet in chain 6 skip 2 single_crochet single_crochet in 11 sts in next st double_crochet in next st + dc3tog* 8 times join with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet fasten_off repeat from * to + join with slip_stitch in top of 1st 140 double_crochet & 230 single_crochet dc3tog fasten_off color 2 color 3 round 34 join in same st chain 1 single_crochet in same st round 28 join in 1st double_crochet to the right of any single_crochet in 9 sts skip 2 single_crochet *double_crochet increase between single_crochet & 1st dc3tog chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in 4 sts double_crochet of next 3 double_crochet double_crochet increase between 2nd & 3rd *ehdc in next st half_double_crochet in 24 sts ehdc in next st double_crochet 6 times double_crochet increase between last double_crochet and next + double_crochet in 5 sts* 8 times repeat from * to + single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet + single_crochet in 19 sts skip 2 single_crochet* 9 times join with slip_stitch in top chain of starting chain 3 fasten repeat from * to + single_crochet in 9 sts join with slip_stitch off 45 double_crochet 18 ehdc & 216 half_double_crochet in 1st single_crochet fasten_off 160 double_crochet & 190 single_crochet color 4 color 3 round 29 join in ehdc to the right
